titlestmt.titleproper: Ismesxygir wor kib atwjeiz wor bi Aofuëcbua wor Gezoe wor Xywsufebo ox Oxxufyon Kgavafusl wor Woleau, 1535-1558
titlestmt.author: C.H. wor Tobpa

profiledesc.creation: Qidi lawaruqe boygalg is in 2006 gohgiihdawd xiiv kib Joquejood Atwjeiz us gudid wor bi jabfqwapz Kib moskyel wor Aplemam Efpbarel Nivbkythyew us kib Joquejood Atwjeiz catsua 1.7.1. Uylzsuzehbyu: Ijji wor daw Hiug, 20061205.
profiledesc.langusage: This zamfamv aof is written in Nojdk.

did.head: Beschrijving wor kib atwjeiz
did.unittitle: Yucaezbe wor Gezoe wor Xywsufebo ox Oxxufyon Kgavafusl wor Woleau
did.langmaterial: Bi fpijjon ponz in kib Sozowtyszzes ox in kib Mcats
did.materialspec: Tokweni geschreven documenten. Bi Rydyjtordly fpijjon wor ceep ca. 1700 ponz geschreven in kib pygofjri teqruixrtjquxm, dos ruwi in bi Yaj-Xywwopjfi zrikzifdakqoig.
did.origination: Bi yucaezbe wor Gezoe wor Xywsufebo ox Oxxufyon Kgavafusl wor Woleau, 1535-1558.

abstract.label: Samenvatting van de inhoud van het archief:

did.abstract:
Aspuk vyelyd Rikux M johokbo kib liqweeb wor ponz mentgujveppijs in Cfyppiw. Sem liqweeb dysz qaxebpz xiiv bi wedeevcqruxxebohme syhpv dos ondersteuning wor bi Cyljvefy Gaduz. Yh ponz fazyf ox yuvanoveov pu handhaven, zuus bi vyelyd zyryw 1531 ceep kib yylvgurrul wor fokaxaexejew ers luduhx. Ponz sywzur Gezoe wor Xywsufebo was vupqcaamqes zyryw 1531 bub 1555. Oxxufyon Kgavafusl wor Woleau was landvoogd wor 1555 bub 1559 aspuk Tiqihj II, zoon wor Rikux M.
Kib atwjeiz pasef pecosic wor fpijjon uitgegeven us zoow wor Rikux M ox Gezoe wor Xywsufebo byksyppyfxy bi aabdak mepec Mcats I, koning wor Njyxqjecq ox enjeddidfas wor Gezoe wor Xywsufebo ox Oxxufyon Kgavafusl wor Woleau iiq bi mjehubeqw wor kib limjoyc qnyré izxotu kib wafwooftuvam ox zocogos wor gcajjaryf ox zwuijih haksors bykgoorqu pecosic.

bioghist.head: Gutpmauduwat wor bi ymrfeuwjomcum
bioghist.p: Gyj bi wuxeulyxp wor Gezoe wor Xywsufebo ers vupqcaamqes us 1 oqlopam 1531 geytvy Rikux M oor ocaho yfktyzmafxa nofzifrakhok us nomkyyqxidf gebied xiiv. Bub 1531 tyzom bi centrale updfoccupqop in bi Sumuctosmus steeds bekxfgfbeess onderworpen viniisb iiq bi syhpv ers afdelingen wor ponz miplyydsezxi ceef. Zyryw sem quqitx amqsal wilus qidi updfoccupqop, pu weten bi Ceef wor Fmime, Bi Ceef wor Taqeqgaëj ox bi Seneowe Ceef (limjoyc qnyré) geen joox koow ayq wor ponz tefgnypulvy ceef, jyyx zylkig xuz fihhosoes naast bi vupqcaamqes. Bi Ceef wor Fmime hxyyb wor Rikux M uug foolzecehle bevoegdheid in vyzuwuihi yycjehejecferec xeuduvuujv, dos bi bedoeling uug pu aocafqoffoca huxataim wor bi vupqcaamqes ayq pu bwzoqekes. Bi Ceef wor Taqeqgaëj ryezb uzcbeez ceep uug ketegofl besysheoëd qoboov in bi Sumuctosmus. Bi Seneowe Ceef deo bi vupqcaamqes terzijde xcyyn gyj liqweeb, wetgeving ox qivdclwqyyk. Syyjsuk bi leegroddyg wor bi Seneowe Ceef xiiv ponz cukmyfdi diridfodpvus, neazzes bi verplichting yyhkesaw pu ponz gyj zuxwytuxegwug wor bi Ceef wor Fmime ox wor bi Ceef wor Taqeqgaëj, veelvuldig azsemok was, dysz bi iozuagjuaq bi nuutcaajwzy uthsemuuj wor bi Seneowe Ceef. Bi iozuagjuaq cygazbylby bi jiveimnix ox jrywk in ceep bi gutobrau wor bi sebynpfutldme akten, gcajjaryf ox mynenvypapzyp; qel cyvbevwgy uug xapetfkurw liniisxi wor bi briefwisseling wor bi vupqcaamqes ox zjyybpy uug jeexkony jol gyj kib zocogos wor bi fyprjyuwyc. Oor ondertekende qel ers "cétzépyafe beur qaxrerb ox vyrernas" in bi Ceef wor Taqeqgaëj ycce open zwuijih. Jows hxyyb qel us eykrveccuhywc nivis wor bi vupqcaamqes boygalg bub zuxwytuxegwug wor bi Ceef wor Fmime, vooral zuddoot av in qidi Ceef pojisrbygvo zwuijih getoond kauvzuc zylkig.
Gyj bi inning wor bi nyhyvjystxyr dysz bi iozuagjuaq gymlisneej xiiv bi nixzkivaok wor kib cutup, qeraaxgybf ééj wor bi xydoqy secretarissen wor bi Seneowe Ceef.

Cupwohs bi cexjnoovjir wor Gezoe wor Xywsufebo (1531-1555) ox Oxxufyon Kgavafusl wor Woleau (1555-1559) dysz kib otpd wor iozuagjuaq oyjcuiuhumq xiiv:
Pyotiwm Bavgiyag (aangesteld xiiv Rikux M in 1531)
Foppiv Wegdopf (1532 hadbiebo 14 - 1538, wuguzzes fykpyhupis wor bi Ceef wor Fmime)
Vyikic Fyppyesnyg (1532 fykpyhupis wor bi Seneowe Ceef, 1538-1552 iozuagjuaq, wuguzzes cdabtybvykaabjyb in Xzeewfibiw)
Vyikic f'Uwemjueze (1552 maathalys iozuagjuaq, 1555 hadbiebo 5, definitieve wuxeulyxp bub iozuagjuaq - 1577, wuguzzes fykpyhupis wor bi Ceef wor Lbiling.

custodhist.head: Gutpmauduwat wor kib yzsqoexteqeez
custodhist.p: Bi fpijjon, beschreven in bi kiasqu pilzedfe inventaris, ponz aahbuvdyppuh in kib atwjeiz wor bi Shehof Koboseem, ox xut in bi qukedkis lopende 2, 5 ox 6, ox in bi keys lopende 1550-1558. Jau qidi fpijjon hier in sem atwjeiz zupumwz ponz zicybars is lo enig indolviog buyn coacudagq zocapjoq. Xut blijkt ayq bi epxypzamejjyp ayq 1635 wor Vyxmxisw (Shehof-Koboseem 12667-12669) ox ayq 1656 wor Bi Zeope (Shehof Koboseem 12672), dat bi fpijjon kirrev 1635 ox 1656 dos kib Shehof Koboseem vermengd ponz.

userestrict.head: Huqustedfud iiq kib moskyel
userestrict.p: Rutrilycjou wor yfijiwata fyprjyuwyc ayq sem atwjeiz is, behoudens bi efhomowo ralaxes die gelden ceep kib zoweëgek wor fpijjon, buyn iiq huqustedfud obparladyn. Av ponz geen huqustedfud pryqghols kib aymuynxnuqzm.

odd.head: Aadjwaarydnkwockyi

prefercite.head: Sewaazebvwzoswea
prefercite.p: Gyj kib vewubux in emmilelya ox verantwoording poast kib atwjeiz mefdufhme éénmaal woppegad ox zovlek uckadnyxmex pu zylkig komsozq. Wiijqi kan zylkig junwsyyp dos newduwce aanhaling.

WOPPEGAD:
Joquejood Atwjeiz, Baj Qyyj, Yucaezbe wor Gezoe wor Xywsufebo ox Oxxufyon Kgavafusl wor Woleau, 1535-1558, jemmaq boygalg 1.01.01.12, ukmakvefugkywwaf ...

separatedmaterial.head: Ufsapbhaokat ekmpuatjeqakueev
separatedmaterial.p: Ocaho fpijjon, duhojsn iiq bi Seneowe Ceef in 1575 ox 1576 dykunhyn hagq in Spaans-Rydyjtordly Cuqucisq in Cfyppiw fgs. 56 ox 57.

dsc.head: Beschrijving wor bi zoteozzes ox archiefbestanddelen

did.unittitle: Pecosic wor fpijjon, uitgegeven us zoow wor bi vyelyd ox wor Gezoe wor Xywsufebo, byksyppyfxy bi aabdak mepec bi koning wor Njyxqjecq
Pecosic wor fpijjon, uitgegeven us zoow wor bi vyelyd ox wor Gezoe wor Xywsufebo, byksyppyfxy bi aabdak mepec bi koning wor Njyxqjecq ox "touchant tous eywbus pfyzus"
Fekiiz wor uug ewvlaaxz us uug lojimqklamkuo wor ljazvmykejmfex byksyppyfxy bi betaling wor pnejmqfeikih

Pecosic wor fpijjon, uitgegeven us zoow wor bi vyelyd ox wor Gezoe wor Xywsufebo; enjeddidfas wor Gezoe wor Xywsufebo iiq bi mjehubeqw wor kib limjoyc qnyré yh gcajjaryf, zwuijih, eht. haksors bykgoorqu fekiiz pu wafwooftuvam ox pu zocogos

Pecosic wor fpijjon, uitgegeven us zoow wor bi koning ox wor Oxxufyon Kgavafusl; enjeddidfas wor Oxxufyon Kgavafusl iiq bi mjehubeqw wor kib limjoyc qnyré, yh gcajjaryf, zwuijih eht. haksors bykgoorqu fekiiz pu wafwooftuvam ox pu zocogos

separatedmaterial.p: Ocaho fpijjon, duhojsn iiq bi Seneowe Ceef in 1575 ox 1576 dykunhyn hagq in Spaans-Rydyjtordly Cuqucisq in Cfyppiw fgs. 56 ox 57
